headline: Show HN: Japanese Kana Learning Flashcards
description:
I started learning japanese a few weeks ago and I find I had difficulties memorizing the kanas.

So I decided to create a set of flashcards with LateX I could print with my own printer to work on it.

As it might help some people and as I didn't find any set of cards with all those infos, I'm releasing it under CC BY-SA 4.0. some images are taken from Wikimpedia, attributions & licence are listed in a dedicated file.

As said I'm only learning and I'm not at all fluent in JP so there is possibly some errors and it's definitly still missing some pronunciation exemples.

The LateX structure is also probably horrible, sorry about that.

I'm open to any and all suggestions to improve it.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 日语假名学习闪卡
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 日語假名學習閃卡
description_zh-Hans:
我几周前开始学习日语，我发现我在记忆卡纳斯方面有困难。

所以我决定创建一套带有LateX的闪卡，我可以用自己的打印机打印出来。

由于它可能会帮助一些人，而且我没有找到任何一套包含所有这些信息的卡片，我在CC BY-SA 4.0下发布它。

如上所述，我只是在学习，而且我的日语也不是很流利，所以可能会有一些错误，而且肯定还缺少一些发音的例子。
description_zh-Hant:
我幾周前開始學習日語，我發現我在記憶卡納斯方面有困難。

所以我決定創建一套帶有LateX的閃卡，我可以用自己的打印機打印出來。

由於它可能會幫助一些人，而且我沒有找到任何一套包含所有這些信息的卡片，我在CC BY-SA 4.0下發布它。

如上所述，我只是在學習，而且我的日語也不是很流利，所以可能會有一些錯誤，而且肯定還缺少一些發音的例子。
